name: Minisoft Ltd
tag_list: it-audit, software-license-management, network-discovery, file-management, event-log-management, event-log-consolidation-and-archive, drive-management, capacity-planning, cloud-computing
overview:
Manufacturers of high speed agentless IT network auditing software.

nanotech Software (a trading name of Minisoft Ltd) are the creators of unique agentless software which can discover and audit IT network devices at the rate of 250 nodes/ip addresses per second, returning data at the rate of 6,000 nodes per minute, over 1 million nodes per hour. Due to the high speed of this technology the software is able to run 24/7 providing constant monitoring.

The software monitors and records, in real time, via MS SQL, changes to the environment and current active user. The software does not install on any machine on the network, not even the host. The software, which takes the form of a number of task specific applications, is provided as SaaS (Software as a Service) and is available as a local solution or a “Cloud Computing” solution working with Microsoft’s recent provision of SQL Azure Cloud based SQL as a service solution.

IT Asset management and audit as “SaaS” and “Cloud Computing”
